resources.string: Current directory saved as starting directory.

FILE PREVIEW: 
Scaling with two fingers - changing font size. 

QUICK MENU: 
Click on top of the screen - show / hide quick menu. 
-5, -1, +1, +5 buttons - tranposition by number of semitones. 
0 button - restore original key. 

AUTOSCROLL: 
Click on bottom of the screen - turn on / off autoscrolling. If beginning of the file is visible, autoscrolling starts with counting down. 
Manual scrolling down while autoscrolling - skip counting down or speed up autoscrolling. 
Manual scrolling up while autoscrolling - enable counting down or slow down autoscrolling.
